## Acceptance Criteria for Milestone Completion

### Functional Completeness
- [ ] All open issues resolved and closed
- [ ] Core functionality working end-to-end
- [ ] Integration with dependent flows validated

### Quality Standards
- [ ] Zero P0/P1 bugs remaining in milestone
- [ ] 90%+ test coverage for milestone features
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met
- [ ] Security review completed (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] User documentation complete
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Known issues documented
- [ ] Retrospective completed

## Definition of Done

### Milestone Closure Criteria
- [ ] All planned issues completed
- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Quality gates passed
- [ ] Documentation published
- [ ] Stakeholder sign-off obtained

### Quality Gates
- [ ] No critical bugs in production for X weeks
- [ ] Test coverage ‚â•X%
- [ ] Performance metrics met
- [ ] Security/compliance requirements met (if applicable)
